price: Então, haverá apenas, um só Clangor, e ei-los que olharão, estarrecidos,
arabic: فَإِنَّمَا هِيَ زَجۡرَةٞ وَٰحِدَةٞ فَإِذَا هُمۡ يَنظُرُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: fa-innamā hiya zajratun wāḥidatun fa-idhā hum yanẓurūna
